mapper.select: SELECT SEQ ,CONTENTS ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS CREATE_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS UPDATE_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(DELETE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS DELETE_DATE FROM MEMO WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT #{begin}, 10

SELECT SEQ ,CONTENTS ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS CREATE_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS UPDATE_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(DELETE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS DELETE_DATE FROM MEMO WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMO SET CONTENTS = #{contents} ,UPDATE_DATE = now() WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE MEMO SET DELETE_DATE = now() WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{seq}
